overview: Lights, cameras, and plenty of action... a talent show is always an opportunity for countless wannabe talents who will stop at nothing to cum out on top. Intrigue, backstabbing and dirty secrets all collide as the organizers of this competition soon find out as the talent is ready to give it all up for a place in the finals. Starring Anita Berlusconi, Cherry Kiss, Klaudia Hot, Lyen Parker, Nikky Thorne, Nina & Sophie Lynx.
title: Porn Idol
